title: My fear is that they will just gut eve
body:
Evelynn has been my favorite jungler for the longest time for several reasons
**Playing against her
**
-Forces you to ward so you stop being a nooby noob
-Helps you learn about map awareness and to be careful for her gap closing into ult
**Playing as her**
-the epitome of noob stompy stomp imo (Low elo just doesn't know how to handle her from what I have seen)
- She is fun, she captures the entire role of assassin, sneaks up behind someone and obliterates them
-Her kit is challenging because she is really weak early on (Low base damages, very weak clears making her vulnerable to invades)

She gives me the feel of risky with a high chance of reward and i love that play style, my ultimate fear though, is that they are going  to rework her and give her the poppy treatment (Strong as hell on release and then after a path or two, get gutted like a fish)

replies.body:
Evelynn doesnt have a kit thats balanceable. Being perma-invis is just not healthy and pink wards do not counter her especially in lane because good evelynns/shacos/rengars do not gank from river... They gank from lane 

As much as i love her whole design i think her perma-invis is just too unhealthy

Her lore is literally for being invisible, it makes sense, it is her identity, pink wards, if you know how to play just slap one in lane, itll give enough  leverage, evelynn cant come to your lane and if the enemy laner tries to kill it, thats free harass

> [{quoted}](name=jojo9800,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QKoOTyMG,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-08-28T22:04:20.412+0000)
>
> Her lore is literally for being invisible, it makes sense, it is her identity, pink wards, if you know how to play just slap one in lane, itll give enough  leverage, evelynn cant come to your lane and if the enemy laner tries to kill it, thats free harass

Evelynn cannot be in a strong spot. Perma-invis is not something that can be balanced. You cant pink ward the whole map and good evelynns know where to go to not be seen.

My friend who mains shaco never ever ganks from river. You know why? Because you cant pink ward a side bush..He ganks from the lane which honestly guarentees him summoners every single time.

> [{quoted}](name=jojo9800,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QKoOTyMG,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-08-28T22:04:20.412+0000)
>
> if you know how to play just slap one in lane

 if you do manage to pink ward the side that means you have to be pushed up to actually defend it. If thats the case then the pink ward does absolutely nothing... since you're pushed past it....

What lore? Is it that thing she has none of?

You can't pink ward the whole map, and perma stealth is the reason she's been hit with so many nerfs.

Unless her new kit is toxic, there's no reason they will gut her.

The reason why she doesnt have a lot is because she is the master of stealth secrets and deceit? HULLO?
Sure you cant, but you can put them in places and not be a noob about it.

Her passive is still toxic. Mid game I can't pinky everywhere especially considering I won't stay in one spot for long because I might be jungling, farming, split pushing, or grouping.

She has very little lore. We know near to nothing about her. She could be much more interesting.

Team game, get your team to pink known spots, i.e the brush, the lane, the river. Places you know she will touch. Her passive is not toxic, thats like saying rengar's ult is toxic but yet there is an indication. Re read why i like playing against her, it teaches me to get map awareness and to stay safe.

Her lore is interesting because it is so ominous.

5 pinkies won't be able to save you while you roam, split, jungle, and group up all over the map.

Her passive is toxic because it's permanent stealth. In no way is her current passive okay.

Her lore is so minimal. It could be better. They don't talk about her origins, goals, current place of residence, what she is, or who she is.

Okay but if you put 1000 pinks it wouldnt be fair because then her passive would be useless. Say it with me, assassin, her kit is designed to creep up on you and delete you from existence without saying a word.
Her lore is minimal yes, but it covers who she is, an expensive assassin, the reason it is shrouded in mystery is simply because she is good at covering her tracks, which is what assassins do therefore leaving only speculation on where she resides. But as an indicator, twisted fate is her rival, therefore they probably live in the same region.
ok you put a thread about {{champion:32}} needing to be gutted and nerfed that is too strong and now you start a thread about how you hope they dont touch {{champion:28}}

My hope is that they'll just gut Eve.

Stealth was a mistake and has no place in the game.

Stealth currently might not be healthy but to most champs its balanced enough. It's not insane. No champ should be gutted and if you hate Eve so much you should just ask for her stealth to be reduced, changed, or removed.
They already have, but they'll do it again if she somehow becomes prominent because if she's decent she's incredibly frustrating to play against.

So many complaints about stealth that is revealed at 700 units from you. Best advantage Eve has is she can ward enemy territory safely.

If riot cant handle stealth in lol, what if Eve's passive was you cant see Eve on the mini map?
